Haryana gang rape and murder cases show tough laws alone don’t work. The only way to bring about real change in women’s security is to throw resources into it and ensure high conviction rates in sexual offence cases.

In 2016, nearly 39000 rape cases were reported across country. In contrast, only 4739 of such cases resulted in convictions.If there is no fear of getting caught and prosecuted,no amount of tough laws will help.It is time to get basics of policing right to ensure women’s safety.
